There's some freebies for Christmas in Escape From Tarkov
Credit: Battlestate Games
As is tradition, Battlestate Games is giving every Escape From Tarkov player a free gift to celebrate the holiday… [+2088 chars]

articles.author: Mayank Parmar
articles.title: Dell hints at Windows 11's new AI that automatically changes your settings, fixes bugs - WindowsLatest
articles.description: Windows 11 is taking the AI game to the next level with new Copilot features that can automatically identify and fix app issues.
articles.content:
Windows Copilot is limited in its current form, but Microsoft could be working on a new version of AI that could change how you use Windows 11.
In a future release of Windows 11, Microsoft Copilot w… [+2340 chars]
